author: mmusich
body:
Companion PR to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/49237

- remove the streamers for `streamDQMGPUvsCPU` related to run 381594
- add new streamers for `streamDQMGPUvsCPU` for run 397813
- update the `README` file

Needs to be tested with https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/49237.
title: Reorganization due to CMSHLT-3147
